data.title: Pentair: Number of Employees 2010-2024 | PNR
data.meta_description:
Interactive chart of Pentair (PNR) annual worldwide employee count from 2010 to 2024.
  • Pentair total number of employees in 2023 was 10,500, a 6.67% decline from 2022.
  • Pentair total number of employees in 2022 was 11,250, a 0% decline from 2021.
  • Pentair total number of employees in 2021 was 11,250, a 15.38% increase from 2020.
  • Pentair total number of employees in 2020 was 9,750, a 2.63% increase from 2019.
